name: Void Waves
description:
Void Waves is a short puzzle game about using satellites to transmit radio waves. It was developed over 48 hours during Global Game Jam 2017.

The aim is to place satellites in orbit around planets in order to bounce radio waves between them from your home planet to a mysterious alien UFO at the edge of the solar system. Position satellites in order to navigate your transmission through a maze of asteroids that will interrupt the signal. Use as few satellites as possible, as using too many could scramble the message and offend the aliens!

Credits:

Pharez Vitalis - Programming

Lee Kempton - Programming

Rudi Prentice - Programming and Sound

Natalia Patkiewicz - Game Art

Jonathan Brimble - Game Art
